qmc6310¶

Functions for compass sensor

Define I2C address of QMC6310 compass sensor

class QMC6310¶
#include <qmc6310.h>

A class. Class of QMC6310 compass sensor

Private Functions

void _i2cWrite(byte reg, byte val)¶

i2c wite

Parameters

  • reg – byte, register address

  • val – byte, value to write

bool _i2cReadInto(byte reg, byte num, byte *dest)¶

i2c read data

Parameters

  • reg – byte, register address

  • num – number of bytes to read

  • dest – pointer to store read data

Returns

Whether the execution is successful

  • true succeed

  • flase failed
